title: Lexikon der Götter und Dämonen: Namen, Funktionen, Symbole, Attribute
description: The author Containing around 1,800 entries this dictionary covers, in one volume, all the important deities and demons from around the world. The gods of ancient mythology appear alongside the gods of contemporary religion, and lesser' mythologies and religions are also fully covered.provides an exten sive network of cross-references, allowing the reader to draw cross-cultural comparisons. The Dictionary will be an invaluable source of information for anyone interested in comparative religion or the diversity of religious views throughout the world.
author: Manfred Lurker
